title: PBE iP and rp
body: I was recently accepted to the pbe with the new wave of invites and I have logged on multiple times but have not received any iP or rp. I have been wanting to try out the new reworks as well as the new champion select but I do not want to play a game without being able to buy any of these xhampions or at least have runes for the free champions. I have restarted my client several times but still have not received them, what can I do to get these points.

replies.body:
Hey Pitbullworldwide,

You'll receive your starter IP/RP after you complete your first match on the PBE. I recommend playing a bot game to unlock the IP/RP.

Hey Pitbullworldwide, 

When i comes to  PBE related questions and issues its best to send in a ticket to Riot Support. That way they will be able to look into the account and give you the information that you need. 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}} 

Good luck!
